module.name: Bulk Phone Restart
module.changelog: *2.10.0.3* assotred bug fixes *2.10.0.2* #5537 *2.10.0.1* minor fixes *2.10.0.0* new version changes *2.9.0.2* #4401 *2.9.0.1* removed duplicate functions *2.9.0.0* #4627 *2.8.0.1* #4426 *2.8.0.0* #4309 *2.7.0.0* localizations *2.6.0.1* #3912 *2.6.0.0* Initial release
module.description: This module allows users to restart one or multiple phones that support being restarted via a SIP NOTIFY command through Asterisk's sip_notify.conf
